name: Twilight Whisper
description: A cocktail capturing dusk's magic with purple hues, vodka, blackberry liqueur, lime, and a hint of sweetness, garnished with lemon and blackberries.

name: Azure Seascape
description: A refreshing ocean-inspired cocktail blending clear blue spirits with citrus for a seaside experience. Served in a tall glass with ice, lemon, and mint.

name: Blockchain Elixir
description: A cocktail symbolizing blockchain's structure with layers of vodka, blue cura√ßao, lemon-lime soda, and edible gold flakes, garnished with a QR code.

name: Satoshi Spritz
description: Named after Bitcoin's creator, this drink mixes prosecco, peach liqueur, and soda, garnished with a chocolate coin, embodying digital wealth.

name: Ether Fizz
description: Inspired by Ethereum, this cocktail has a butterfly pea flower-induced color shift, garnished with lemon, symbolizing blockchain innovation.

name: Crypto Colada
description: A tropical blend with coconut, pineapple, and mango, featuring a sprinkle of edible silver dust, served with a crypto-themed umbrella.

name: Forest Murmur
description: An enchanted forest in a glass, with gin, elderflower, green chartreuse, and matcha, rimmed with edible flowers, invoking serene forest vibes.

name: Mythical Brew
description: A warm blend of mead, spiced cider, and ginger liqueur, garnished with cinnamon and orange, served in a clay mug, echoing ancient myths.

name: Sunset Serenade
description: A cocktail that mirrors the sunset with tequila, orange liqueur, lime, and cranberry juice, garnished with lime and cherry.
